name: AMERICAN MADE BUSINESS COALITION
description: Coalition of businesses that make their products in the United States.
firms: THE SOCCI LAW FIRM, PLLC (FKA INFLUENCE STRATEGIES)
sampleDescriptions: All federal legislation and regulations relating to manufacturing, trade, tariffs, small business and gun manufacturing by and affecting businesses that make their products in the United States.
